snippet.title: Peripeteia Steam Trailer: Unveiled
snippet.description:
Proudly presented by Ninth Exodus with music by the exceptional Sewerslvt!
DOWNLOAD and wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1437760 

Peripeteia is an upcoming indie cyberpunk Action RPG in the vain of classics such as Deus Ex, System Shock, and  other 0451 games. We proudly present here our trailer original made for steam.

You play as Marie, a cyber soldier in an invisible war beneath the noise skies of Neo-Poland. 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/90sGraphics
Discord: https://discord.gg/2Rs5nydSH3
